Title: Affinity
Plot: Teal'c becomes the chief suspect in a murder investigation after he moves into an apartment off-base. Carter considers her future with Pete.
GuestStars: Brad Kelly, Christopher Attadia, Lucas Wolf, Judith Berlin, Erica Durance, Sean Millington, Peter Bryant, Adrian Hughes, Kate Mitchell, Brad Sihvon, Rob Hayter, Benita Ha, Michael Rogers, Derek Hamilton, Clay Virt
